name: eximd
params: setvar s0, wff w0, wff w1, wff w2

body.origin:
|- wi(w0, wi(wex(s0, w1), wex(s0, w2)))
-| wi(w0, wal(s0, w0))
-| wi(w0, wi(w1, w2))

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(w0, wi(wex(s0, w1), wex(s0, w2)))
-| wi(w0, wal(s0, w0))
-| wi(w0, wi(w1, w2))

|- wi(w0, wi(wex(s0, w1), wex(s0, w2)))
-| wi(w0, wi(w1, w2))
-| wnf(s0, w0)

comment: Deduction form of Theorem 19.22 of [Margaris] p. 90, see ~ exim . (Contributed by NM, 29-Jun-1993.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 24-Sep-2016.)
